mil6.2.2:1.2_2: tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
mil6.2.2:1.4_1: tasmiṁ divase ācariyaṁ vā upajjhāyaṁ vā pattacīvaraṁ vā na labhetha,
mil6.2.2:1.4_2: api nu kho so arahā sayaṁ vā pabbajeyya divasaṁ vā atikkameyya,
mil6.2.2:1.4_3: añño koci arahā iddhimā āgantvā taṁ pabbājeyya vā parinibbāyeyya vā”ti?
mil6.2.2:1.5_1: sayaṁ pabbajanto theyyaṁ āpajjati, na ca divasaṁ atikkameyya,
mil6.2.2:1.5_2: aññassa arahantassa āgamanaṁ bhaveyya vā na vā bhaveyya,
mil6.2.2:2.1_1: visame liṅge liṅgadubbalatāya arahattaṁ patto gihī tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
mil6.2.2:3.1_1: bhojanaṁ sabbasattānaṁ āyupālakaṁ jīvitarakkhakaṁ visamakoṭṭhassa mandadubbalagahaṇikassa avipākena jīvitaṁ harati.
mil6.2.2:3.3_1: visame liṅge liṅgadubbalatāya arahattaṁ patto gihī tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
mil6.2.2:4.1_1: parittaṁ tiṇasalākaṁ upari garuke pāsāṇe ṭhapite dubbalatāya bhijjitvā patati;
mil6.2.2:4.2_1: arahattaṁ patto gihī tena liṅgena arahattaṁ dhāretuṁ asakkonto tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
mil6.2.2:5.1_1: puriso abalo dubbalo nihīnajacco parittapuñño mahatimahārajjaṁ labhitvā khaṇena paripatati paridhaṁsati osakkati,
mil6.2.2:5.2_1: arahattaṁ patto gihī tena liṅgena arahattaṁ dhāretuṁ na sakkoti,
mil6.2.2:5.2_2: tena kāraṇena tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā”ti.
